description:
After surviving the incident on the island, Team Japan lives to fight another day. Because the last round’s results were annulled, a rematch will be held in Mexico. But something seems off about those professional skydivers hired for the match…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jigoku e no Dive!! Aratanaru Houryaku!
Le saut de l`enfer ! Un nouveau complot !
The Skydive to Hell! A New Kind of Diabolical Plan!
ดำดิ่งสู่นรก!! แผนร้ายครั้งใหม่!
地獄へのダイブ!! 新たなる謀略!
